snippet: The global decline in monthly sales during October represents the fast-food chain’s first such dip in nearly a decade.
abstract: McDonald's announces sales in stores open at least 13 months fell around the world by 1.8 percent in October, first such drop in almost a decade; executives attribute decline to calender quirks, unsteady global economy, and stiffer competition; stock drops about 2 percent on the news.
lead_paragraph: The global decline in monthly sales during October represents the fast-food chain’s first such dip in nearly a decade.

headline.seo: McDonald’s Reports Global Decline in Sales
headline.main: McDonald’s Reports Unexpectedly Sharp Drop in Sales
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Reports Unexpectedly Sharp Drop in Sales
